name: Kids Pack
description:
Hey Girls and Boys! Welcome to the Kids Games Fun Pack!

This 5-in-1 Fun Pack has all the amazing games you love, including some games you won't find anywhere else!

DENTIST!
Help the kids get ready for school with clean teeth! You can fix their teeth and decorate them too!

DOCTOR!
Uh oh, the kids are sick! Help them get better with your doctor toolset! Don't forget the x-rays!

HAIR SALON!
Make your kid a star with a beautiful new haircut! Cut, dye and decorate!

DONUT MAKER!
I bet you're hungry! Why not make a treat...like some homemade donuts?!

STICKER CAMERA!
You won't find this game anywhere else out there! Decorate your own REAL pictures and upload them to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and more!
